name: Angry Bit
description:
An Angry Game 1Bit Demake for Jamtharuu Game Jam

This game jam entry has 10 playable levels.

You can choose between 23 1bit color palettes.

Controls :

Grab the bird with the mouse and make him fly.

Kill all the Godots.

Credits :

Code & Graphics : jmb462

Sounds : Sonniss GameAudioGDC Bundle

Musics : Casual Game Music Pack Vol. 1

1 Bit Color Palettes : lospec.com

Made with Godot Engine

Thanks :

FR_Solocode_Godot, Espace Godot and PixelWood 

french Discord servers.
